about.title: About the Owner
about.description: Hi! I'm Carlos, a local cycling enthusiast with over 10 years of experience offering guided bike rentals in Los Cabos. I love helping people discover the natural beauty of Baja California by bike.
about.address: Location: Av. del Mar #123, Los Cabos, B.C.S., Mexico

whatsapp.message: Hi! I'm interested in renting a bike in Los Cabos.

routes.route1Description: A calm route along the coast with ocean views and cool breezes.
routes.route2Description: Mountain adventure perfect for experienced cyclists.
routes.route3Description: Challenging ride through the dry Baja California desert.

footer.aboutText: Guiding cyclists through Los Cabos since 2010.
